title: Leadership Competency Strengthening Program through Overseas Training Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and managerial experience
context.additional_context: Program for adult learners to develop science leadership competencies through experiential learning simulating overseas training experiences

learning_goals: Learners can analyze overseas scientific field cases and cultural differences to develop global collaboration strategies.
Learners can apply knowledge acquired through experiential learning activities to at least two innovation projects within an organization.
Learners can enhance self-directed learning abilities through reflective journaling and feedback based on overseas training experiences.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
